name: Back in Time (Tim Grün)
description:
Use the power of traveling back in time to solve a series of mind-bending puzzles.

Back in Time

In Back in Time you will learn how to master the art of time manipulation by solving unique puzzles with exciting mechanics. Keep an eye on how the flow of time affects the world around you to fully utilize your time traveling abilities.

We host a private discord server for Back in Time speed runs. Comment your best time and get in our league.

This game was originally developed as part of the University of Würzburg's Game Lab I module and got nominated for the Game of the Year Award. If you are interested in the details of the project, have a look at the poster or write us a comment. 

Back in Time Presentation Poster
